<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BitsInCurWord = BytesRead &#42; 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BitsInCurWord &gt;= NumBits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use a mask to avoid undefined behavior.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurWord &gt;&gt;= (NumBits &amp; Mask);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BitsInCurWord -= NumBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> R;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#a844fc5e45f6ac94e7da1f7f5a94dc604">word&#95;t</a> R = BitsInCurWord ? CurWord : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BitsLeft = NumBits - BitsInCurWord;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> fillResult = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#ae3b93b659d4c4f5aeaaedc892916d1bf">fillCurWord</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::move(fillResult);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we run out of data, abort.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BitsLeft &gt; BitsInCurWord)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4d2fd926089a58d482fb67a362e11bad">createStringError</a>(std::errc::io&#95;error,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected end of file reading %u of %u bits&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               BitsInCurWord, BitsLeft);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#a844fc5e45f6ac94e7da1f7f5a94dc604">word&#95;t</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/mathextras-h/#a9211f62d8e1e6de999eaa63ec0f6ae02">R2</a> = CurWord &amp; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#a844fc5e45f6ac94e7da1f7f5a94dc604">~word&#95;t</a>(0) &gt;&gt; (BitsInWord - BitsLeft));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use a mask to avoid undefined behavior.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurWord &gt;&gt;= (BitsLeft &amp; Mask);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BitsInCurWord -= BitsLeft;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">    R |= <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/mathextras-h/#a9211f62d8e1e6de999eaa63ec0f6ae02">R2</a> &lt;&lt; (NumBits - BitsLeft);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> R;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#ae4203a4bfd3d7e5cc1a1e43a76dc4188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor/#ae4203a4bfd3d7e5cc1a1e43a76dc4188">ReadVBR</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumBits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t allow reserving more elements than the number of bits, assuming</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// When advancing through a bitstream cursor, each advance can discover a few</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// different kinds of entries:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitstreamentry"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitstreamentry">BitstreamEntry</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitstreamentry/#aabd7d39bf1ac32328fce0cb152a9f1ceaff48a2349df5a9fe16c80d1d6e32e479"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitstreamentry/#aabd7d39bf1ac32328fce0cb152a9f1ceaff48a2349df5a9fe16c80d1d6e32e479">Error</a>,    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Malformed bitcode was found.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitstreamentry/#aabd7d39bf1ac32328fce0cb152a9f1cea69bcb0a249ff563515ad5c77bc19ebfe"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitstreamentry/#aabd7d39bf1ac32328fce0cb152a9f1cea69bcb0a249ff563515ad5c77bc19ebfe">EndBlock</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;ve reached the end of the current block, (or the end of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// file, which is treated like a series of EndBlock records.</span></CodeLine>
